sentences.en: CMI and VAS in control group did not change significantly.
sentences.cn: HA浓度 在可复性组和不可复性组都无显著改变.CMI、 VAS在 可复性组和不可复性组都降低.

sentences.en: He vas imprisoned for passing forged banknotes.
sentences.cn: 他因使用伪钞而被监禁.

sentences.en: HR, SP, DP, MAP, SpO 2 and VAS of each patient before and after induce were recorded.
sentences.cn: 分别记录两组患者在诱导前、诱导后的HR 、 SP 、 DP 、 MAP 、 SpO2的变化和VAS评分.

sentences.en: Knee pain during exercises was assessed with visual analog scale ( VAS ).
sentences.cn: 运动过程中的疼痛用目测类比评分法评价.

sentences.en: Mais enfin Guillaume , tu ne vas pas croire à cette l é gende!
sentences.cn: 但Guillaume, 你不可以相信这种事!

sentences.en: Results: VAS and BCS were no significant differences between two groups in every time after operation ( P > 0.05 )
sentences.cn: 结果: L组VAS、BCS与M组之间差异均无统计学意义 ( P均>0.05 ).

sentences.en: The efficacy was assessed using visual analog scores ( VAS ) and EC 50 calculated using method of Dixon.
sentences.cn: 以视觉模拟评分法 ( VAS ) 评估镇痛效果,按Dixon法计算罗哌卡因的EC50值.

sentences.en: The incidence of the waist - back pain and visual analogue scale ( VAS ) were recorded after operation.
sentences.cn: 比较2组患者术后腰背疼痛发生率和两组 vas 评分中不同程度疼痛构成比.

sentences.en: The name of the hotel vas " The Grand Eurasian Hotel. "
sentences.cn: 旅馆名叫 “ 欧亚大旅社 ”.

sentences.en: The sly Turkish fox vas going to show his bushy tail, Luca thought.
sentences.cn: 路加心里想:看来这只狡狯的“土耳其”狐狸快要露出毛茸茸的尾巴了.

sentences.en: These are often described vas a crawling sensation.
sentences.cn: 这类瘙痒常被描述为虫爬感.

sentences.en: VAS score, analgesic drug consumption, nausea, vomit, pruritus were observed at 4 h , 8 h , 24 h and 48 h after operation.
sentences.cn: 分别于术毕后4 、 8 、 24、48h观测VAS 、 镇痛药消耗量 、 恶心 、 呕吐 、 骚痒等指标.

sentences.en: Visual analogue pain scale ( VAS ) and Bruggman comfort score ( BCS ) were observed at 1、2、4、24、48 h after operation.
sentences.cn: 手术结束后1、2、4、8、24、48h各时段采用视觉模拟评分 ( VAS ) 及舒适评分 ( BCS ) 评估两组镇痛效果及不良反应.

sentences.en: Visual analogy score ( VAS ) and the sleep quality were used for the evaluation of pain releasing.
sentences.cn: 使用疼痛缓解视觉模拟评分法 ( vas ) 和睡眠质量评估疼痛缓解程度.

words.tran_cn: 血管收缩剂；血管收缩神经

trans.tran_en: a vessel, duct, or tube that carries a fluid
